Issue.creator: rameshthoomu
Issue.summary: Unsupported config type error on peer version
Issue.description: ERRO 001 Fatal error when initializing core config : error when reading core config file: Unsupported Config Type ""{code} Below is the orderer version {code:java} ibmadmin@build-vm:/opt/gopath/vb1st/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric/build/bin$ ./orderer version orderer: Version: 1.2.0-snapshot-08e5958 Go version: go1.10 OS/Arch: linux/amd64 Experimental features: true{code} fabric# 08e5958 >
